nodes.text: A base was used for military purposes by the New Republic on the planet Mirrin Prime. The base's commanding officer was Major Lonno Deso. Thirty years after the Battle of Endor, the T-85 X-wing starfighter squadron Rapier Squadron was hosted on the base. Following some skirmishes between the First Order and the squadron, it defected to the Resistance and was integrated into the Resistance's Starfighter Corps.
